tool.name: GenomeRunner SNP Enrichment Analysis
tool.description: Calculates the enrichment of SNPs against genomic feature tracks
tool.command: wrapper_grsnp.py -g " #for $g in $gfs ${g.gf}, #end for ${gfs_tree} " -f " #for $f in $fois ${f.foi}, #end for " --gf_names " #for $g in $gfs ${g.gf.name}, #end for " --foi_names " #for $f in $fois ${f.foi.name}, #end for " -b "$background" --bg_name "$background.name" -d "$html_file.files_path" -o "$html_file" -n "${out_prefix}"

param.name: gfs_tree
param.label: Choose genomic features to use
param.help: Selecting no tables will result in using all tables.

param.name: out_prefix
param.label: Title for the output file - to remind you what the job was for
param.help: Letters and numbers only please - other characters will be removed
